entities.name: mr moody
entities.description: Mr. Moody is a person who lives in a heavily guarded house. He had raised a false alarm.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a person who was forced to modify several memories before he could escape from the policemen.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: Daily Prophet is a newspaper that asked questions about why Mr. Weasley had involved the Ministry in such an undignified and potentially embarrassing scene.

relationships.description: Daily Prophet questioned Mr. Weasley about why he had involved the Ministry in such an undignified and potentially embarrassing scene.
